title: Easy Spanish paella
ingredients: ['100ml olive oil', '200g chopped onion', '200g sausage', '600g chicken', 'salt to taste', '300g rice', '150g prawns', '25g clams', '25g mussels', '25g calamari', '100ml white wine', '100g chopped tomato', '400ml chicken stock', '1 pinch saffron', '1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika', '50g garden peas']
